Class CharacterTree.Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • CharacterTree.Node
  • Enclosing class:
    CharacterTree

    private class CharacterTree.Node
extends java.lang.Object
    A node in the character tree

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CharacterTree.Node[] children
      This node's children (one for each letter of the alphabet)
      private boolean leaf
      Returns whether this node is a leaf node
      private CharacterTree.Node parent
      This node's parent
      private char value
      The character stored in the node
      private boolean word
      Returns whether this node is a word

      • words

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> words()
        Recursively creates a list of all the words from the children of the current node
        Returns:
        A list of all valid words that stem from this node

      • makeString

        public java.lang.String makeString()
        Creates a string from characters, used when making a list of words to return
        Returns:
        A string representing this node's lineage (All parent node characters and this node's character)

        Returns the specified child given a character
